definition.name: NXmanipulator
definition.doc: Base class to describe the use of manipulators and sample stages.

field.name: type
field.doc: Type of manipulator, Hexapod, Rod, etc.

group.name: cryostat
group.doc: Cryostat for cooling the sample (and, potentially, the whole manipulator).

field.name: setpoint
field.doc: In case of a fixed or averaged cooling temperature, this is the scalar temperature setpoint. It can also be a 1D array of temperature setpoints (without time stamps).

field.name: value
field.doc: In the case of an experiment in which the temperature is changed and the setpoints are recorded with time stamps, this is an array of temperature setpoints.

group.name: temperature_sensor
group.doc: Temperature sensor measuring the sample temperature.

field.name: value
field.doc: In case of a single or averaged temperature measurement, this is the scalar temperature measured by the sample temperature sensor. It can also be a 1D array of measured temperatures (without time stamps).

field.name: value
field.doc: In the case of an experiment in which the temperature changes and is recorded with time stamps, this is an array of length m of temperatures.

field.name: output_heater_power
field.doc: In case of a fixed or averaged heating power, this is the scalar heater power. It can also be a 1D array of heater powers (without time stamps).

field.name: value
field.doc: In the case of an experiment in which the heater power is changed and recorded with time stamps, this is an array of length m of temperature setpoints.

field.name: setpoint
field.doc: In case of a fixed or averaged temperature, this is the scalar temperature setpoint. It can also be a 1D array of temperature setpoints (without time stamps).

field.name: value
field.doc: In the case of an experiment in which the temperature is changed and the setpoints are recorded with time stamps, this is an array of length m of temperature setpoints.

group.name: drain_current_ammeter
group.doc: Ammeter measuring the drain current of the sample and sample holder.

field.name: value
field.doc: In case of a single or averaged drain current measurement, this is the scalar drain current measured between the sample and sample holder. It can also be an 1D array of measured currents (without time stamps).

field.name: value
field.doc: In the case of an experiment in which the current changes and is recorded with time stamps, this is an array of length m of currents.

group.name: sample_bias_potentiostat
group.doc: Actuator applying a voltage between sample holder and sample.

field.name: setpoint
field.doc: In case of a fixed or averaged applied bias, this is the scalar voltage applied between sample and sample holder. It can also be an 1D array of voltage setpoints (without time stamps).

field.name: value
field.doc: In the case of an experiment in which the bias is changed and the setpoints are recorded with time stamps, this is an array of length m of voltage setpoints.

group.name: sample_bias_voltmeter
group.doc: Sensor measuring the voltage applied to sample and sample holder.

field.name: value
field.doc: In case of a single or averaged bias measurement, this is the scalar voltage measured between sample and sample holder. It can also be an 1D array of measured voltages (without time stamps).

field.name: value
field.doc: In the case of an experiment in which the bias changes and is recorded with time stamps, this is an array of length m of voltages.

group.doc: Any additional actuator on the manipulator used to control an external condition.
Any additional sensors on the manipulator used to monitor an external condition.
Class to describe the motors that are used in the manipulator.
